definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: And Israel set liers in wait round about Gibeah.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人在基比亚的四围设下伏兵。

sentences.english: For I heard the defaming of many, fear on every side.
sentences.chinese: 我听见了许多人的谗谤，四围都是惊吓。

sentences.english: The whole Babylonian army, under the commander of the imperial guard, broke down the walls around Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 跟从护卫长迦勒底的全军就拆毁耶路撒冷四围的城墙。

sentences.english: He built up the city around it, from the supporting terraces to the surrounding wall, while Joab restored the rest of the city.
sentences.chinese: 大卫又从米罗起，四围建筑城墙，其余的是约押修理。

sentences.english: These are the boundaries around the people of Judah by their clans.
sentences.chinese: 这是犹大人按着宗族所得之地四围的交界。

sentences.english: And Israel set tiers in wait round about Gibeah.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人在基比亚的四围设下伏兵。

sentences.english: He warned the assembly, "Move back from the tents of these wicked men!"
sentences.chinese: 于是众人离开可拉，大坍，亚比兰帐棚的四围。

sentences.english: And they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah， and the suburbs thereof round about it.
sentences.chinese: 在犹大地中得了希伯仑和四围的郊野。

sentences.english: Station yourselves around the king, each man with his weapon in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 各人手拿兵器，四围护卫王。

sentences.english: Make tassels on the four corners of the cloak you wear.
sentences.chinese: 你要在所披的外衣上四围做䍁子。

sentences.english: All around the village are vegetable fields.
Then Israel set an ambush around Gibeah.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人在基比亚的四围设下伏兵。

sentences.english: With salvation's walls surrounded, Thou mayst smile at all thy foes.
sentences.chinese: 救恩墙垣四围环绕，尽可嗤笑众仇敌。

sentences.english: They also made around it a rim a handbreadth wide and put a gold molding on the rim.
sentences.chinese: 桌子的四围各做一掌宽的横梁，横梁上镶着金牙边。

sentences.english: Set up the courtyard around it and put the curtain at the entrance to the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 又在四围立院帷，把院子的门帘挂上。

sentences.english: On moonless nights the water was as black as maester's ink, from horizon to horizon.
sentences.chinese: 在无月的夜晚，四围天际，海水黑得如同学士的墨水。

definition: (literary) halls (of a palace or a temple)
